message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. Our product offers unparalleled value and has the potential to significantly impact your business positively. Considering its worth to us and its potential benefits to you, we are offering it to you for $1350000. We believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. We appreciate the value you've placed on the product. However, we're looking to stay within a tighter budget. Considering the product's worth to us, we're willing to pay $1200000 for it. We believe this price still reflects the value of the product and allows us to make a profitable decision. We're open to negotiations and look forward to hearing your thoughts.

Dear Bob, thank you for your response. We understand your budget constraints and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, we would like to offer you our product for $1275000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We hope this revised offer meets your expectations and enables us to move forward with our business transaction.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, we're still looking to stay within our budget of $1200000. Considering the value you've placed on the product, we're willing to meet you halfway and offer $1225000. We believe this price still reflects the value of the product and allows us to make a profitable decision. We're open to further negotiations and look forward to hearing your thoughts.

Dear Bob, thank you for your latest offer. We appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. After careful consideration, we would like to offer you our product for $1250000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We hope this revised offer meets your expectations and enables us to finalize our business transaction.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. We appreciate your persistence in reaching an agreement. However, we're still not willing to exceed our budget of $1200000. We're willing to make one final offer of $1200000, which we believe is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product. If this offer is not acceptable, we will need to explore other options.

Dear Bob, thank you for your final offer. We understand your position and appreciate your efforts to come to an agreement. After careful consideration, we would like to offer you our product for $1225000. This price reflects the value we place on the product and allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. We hope this revised offer meets your expectations and enables us to finalize our business transaction.
